Pre-Game Insights: Malawi last appeared in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers in 2021, reaching the last 16.
Burundi has won just once in their last five games but remains unbeaten in their last three.
Malawi have lost three and won once in four official games this year.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is only the second official clash between the sides in history.
Their last encounter was in July 1987, ending in a 1-1 draw in a friendly game.
